body.p:
Headquarters Provost Marshal,
THIRD DISTRICT OF KENTUCKY.
Bowling Green, Jany 4" 1864
To his Exllency
Thos E Bramlette Gov Ky
Deire Sir

It affords me great pleasure to enclose you my Official Report of the conduct of my Regt, in the late engagments in East Tenn, also a map representing the country from London to Knoxville. My Regt distinguished itself with honor, in two engagements, they bore the brunt of the battle, many of them fell killed and wounded. The command of the 2nd Brigade devolved on me, I covered the retreat of Leut Burnsides Army to Knoxville. Herewith find a discription of the engagements as published in the Journals of the 1st of Jany 1864

I have the honor to be very respectfully
Your obdt Servt
Wm E Hobson Col
13th Ky Vol Infty
